truck.description: This is your truck. It looks ready to hit the road, are you?

warehouse.description: This is warehouse to store the needed parts and loads. It is late in the year so the shelves are mostly empty. You see rusty CABINET, old CLOSET and a DESK

front office.description: This is the front office where everyone checks in when they come in. There seems no one in the front office. You do see a employees LOCKER, a DESK and a bulletin BOARD

gas station.description: This is gas station where trucks fill up for gas and people get their snacks. Looks like gas station is just restocked. You see a SNACK AISLE, a DRINK AISLE, and an ATTENDANT is in the counter playing with his phone

boss office.description: This is boss' office where you get your next trip information. You see your BOSS is again sleeping on his DESK

break room.description: This is a break room where people come to relax or eat on their breaks. Room seems to be full. Lots of people gathering around and talking to each other. You see a your LOCKER, a REFRIGERATOR and a COFFEE MAKER

tech room.description: This is tech room, place for all the IT nerds to hangout. You see everyone is busy on their computer. You see a CABINET, a LAPTOP and a CLOSET

hr office.description: This is human resource room, place where pay check is made. You see everyone busy chatting with each other in big group. You see a TEDDY BEAR, COMPLAINT BOX and a TRASH CAN
